entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
